#include<stdio.h>

int main(){
    int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n; scanf("%d",&n);
        long long area;
        if(n%2!=0)
            n-=1;
        if(n%4==0)
            area = (n*n)/16;
        else{
            n/=2;
            int a = n/2;
            int b = n-a;
            area = a*b;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",area);
    }
    return 0;
}
